alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 7:25PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Fremont County through 800 PM MDT... At 725 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm about 5 miles north of South Pass City, or 21 miles south of Lander, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Fremont County, including the following locations... Atlantic City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
